The Shayzien gloves (3) are gloves that require 20 Defence to equip, and are part of the Shayzien armour (tier 3) set. In order to receive the armour, players must have at least 80% Shayzien favour.

They are dropped by the tier 3 soldier at the Combat Ring in the Shayzien Encampment.

[[File:Shayzien gloves (3) detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Shayzien gloves (3)''' are gloves that require 20 [[Defence]] to equip, and are part of the [[Shayzien armour (tier 3)]] set. In order to receive the armour, players must have at least 80% [[Shayzien]] [[favour]].

They are dropped by the [[Soldier (tier 3)|tier 3 soldier]] at the [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Combat Ring]] in the [[Shayzien Encampment]].
